heading: Monday Night
text: Scattered snow showers north, then cloudy.

heading: Tuesday
temperature: Mid 20s to lower 30s, north to south

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Snow north, tapering off south; another 1 to 3 inches.
temperature: Lower 20s to lower 30s, north to south

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning snow northeast tapering off. Partly sunny southwest.
